name: Mothim
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: While it loves floral honey, it won’t gather any itself. Instead, it plots to steal some from Combee.

attacks.name: Cloak Party
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 3 in any combination of Burmy and Wormadam, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Energy Assist
attacks.effect: Seach your discard pile for a basic Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
